about.quote: Home should feel like an exhale.

highlights.title: Timeless over trendy
highlights.text: Classic forms and finishes that age well.

highlights.title: Tactile comfort
highlights.text: Textures you want to touch; tones that soften a room.

featured.title: A home that invites gathering favourite project
featured.body: We layered warm woods, softened transitions, and introduced a lighting plan that moves from morning clarity to evening glow. Personal heirlooms were integrated to keep the story .
keyMoves: Durable finishes with a soft handfeel

testimonials.quote: Stop your research now. This is the design team to work with.
...they were there for me every step of the way.
My wife and I keep looking for excuses to throw dinner parties.
The whole thing came out better than we could believe.

cards.title: Artfully curated
cards.text: We collaborate with talented artists from the local community and surrounding areas, sourcing and creating original pieces that elevate your space. Explore our carefully selected art collection.

cards.title: Portfolio
cards.text: Peek into kitchens, living rooms, and whole-home transformations.

hero.title: Interiors by Louise Decor & Design
hero.blurb: Louise Decor & Design creates quiet, grounded interiors for everyday life, balancing light, flow, and textures to craft beautiful, functional spaces.

highlights.title: Clarity from day one
highlights.text: Scope, timeline, and budget mapped clearly.

services.title: Full-service design
services.body: Concept through installation for renovations and furnishings.

services.title: Room refresh
